title: Bigger Not Better?
description:
Pablo Torre, Domonique Foxworth and Spencer Hall debate what kind of impact Charles Barkley would have  on LIV Golf and if Mack Brown is right to insinuate that mega-conferences and an expanded playoff would make college football worse.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: (debatable): Would Mega-Conferences & Expanded Playoffs Be Bad For College Football?
